description: This file contains unit tests for the Loyalty model classes, including Loyalty and LoyaltyHistoryEntry, verifying JSON serialization/deserialization and object integrity.

classes.name: LoyaltyHistoryEntry
classes.description: Represents a single loyalty history entry with date, change amount, and reason.

classes.name: Loyalty
classes.description: Represents a user's loyalty data including userId, points, and history of LoyaltyHistoryEntry objects.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point for the test suite executing multiple unit tests on Loyalty models.
